Room.Name: Crystal Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered a magnificant crystal room that intersects the orange jacinith hallway going east to west and the ruby hallway extending to the north. There is a small stairwell to the south that leads down.
Room.LongDescription: A small sign above the staircase says "Crystal Alcove". As you peer down the staircase, you can see your reflection, as if you were waiting at the bottom of the staircase looking up. A cool breeze can be felt coming from the bottom of the stairwell.
